title: Project-Based Mathematics Education Design Utilizing Event-Driven Knowledge Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts Comprehension and Fundamental Understanding of Elementary Education Environments
context.additional_context: Course for preservice/elementary teachers to strengthen math curriculum design and knowledge integration competencies through project-based learning. Conducts experiential learning by replicating real classroom scenarios in VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more principles of project-based learning design and event-driven knowledge integration strategies.
Learners can design and demonstrate math project lessons using VR simulation tools.
Learners can document learning experiences from project processes as structured "boundary objects" and share them with other teachers.
Learners can improve project deliverables two or more times by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
